line_1: Their glory faded, and their race dispers'd,
line_2: The last of nations now, though once the first;

line_1: But now, to gather up what seems dispers'd,
line_2: And touch the subject I design'd at first,

line_1: Why are thy active Spirits all dispers'd?
line_2: Why thy Robe torn, and genial Torch revers'd,
Still place their native Country first;
